page.title: 12A Scholar's Day In Edlington
page.content: After a 60p school lunch of salad, which I like,& lemon meringue,which I don't,I practise running on the field.In the p.m. we do science &, after break,athletics with Mrs.Rech, which is terrific.We play skipping some breaks and sing rhymes like"Sally in the kitchen,doing a bit of stitching,in came the bogey man & pushed Sally out"&"Not last night but the night before 14 burglars came to my door,I ran out to let them in & this is what they said to me:Spanish Lady twirl around,Spanish Lady touch the ground,Spanish Lady do the kicks Spanish Lady do the splits.At 15.45 school finishes & I go home for chicken casserole,my favourite dinner. After a rest sitting on our gate I time myself for a ten lap run round the block.At 20.00 I go in to watch T.V.and wash the pots before bed at 10
